event.name: D8 Business Leaders Forum 2026
event.theme: Achieving Sustainable Growth Through D8 Business Cooperation

agenda.title: Registration and Networking
agenda.description: Participant registration and informal networking among delegates and business leaders.

agenda.title: Opening and Housekeeping
agenda.description: Opening of the forum and housekeeping announcements by the master of ceremony.

agenda.title: Organizing Committee Report
agenda.speaker: Representative of Organizing Committee
agenda.description: Brief report on the objectives, background, and expected outcomes of the forum.

agenda.title: Welcoming Remarks
agenda.speaker: Chair of D8 CCI / KADIN Representative
agenda.description: Welcoming address to all delegates and participating chambers of commerce and industry.

agenda.title: Keynote Speech 1
agenda.speaker: President of Indonesia (invited)
agenda.description: Keynote on D8 cooperation and Indonesia’s priorities for sustainable growth.

agenda.title: Keynote Speech 2
agenda.speaker: Head of Government / Minister from D8 Country (invited)
agenda.description: Keynote on regional economic integration and South–South cooperation.

agenda.title: Photo Session
agenda.description: Group photo with VIPs, speakers, and representatives of D8 chambers.

agenda.title: Panel Discussion: The Investment Roadmap
agenda.subtitle: Catalyzing Cross-Border Capital for Industrial Synergy
panelists: Leaders of D8 Chambers of Commerce and Industry
agenda.description: Panel on unlocking investment opportunities, reducing regulatory barriers, and building industrial synergies across D8 countries.

agenda.title: Signing of Memorandums of Understanding (MoUs)
agenda.description: Signing ceremony of MoUs between chambers, business councils, and strategic partners in D8 countries.

agenda.title: Launch of D8 Women Alliance
agenda.description: Official launch of D8 Women Business Leaders / Women Alliance initiative to promote women’s economic empowerment.

agenda.title: Closing Remarks and Wrap-up
agenda.speaker: Host Representative
agenda.description: Summary of key points, next steps, and closing of the Business Leaders Forum.

side_events.name: D8 International Exhibition
side_events.description: International B2B and B2C exhibition with country pavilions and business showcases.
components: Country pavilions of D8 member states
Export–import talk shows and halal certification sessions
Chambers lounge and business matching area
Food court, food demo, and fashion show
